word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重建筑物的构造形式。
普通用词，指任何建筑物，但不涉及建筑物的大小、风格以及所用材料。
指永久住家时，带有家庭所特有的温暖、情感等气息。
泛指一切建筑物，不限于居住的房子。
指大而堂皇的寓所或公馆，也指法律上的居住点。
可指长期或临时的住处，也指简陋或临时搭建的躲避风雨的场所。
正式用词，仅指人们居住的任何建筑物。
指长久或固定的住所或居住地。
中性词，泛指一切供居住的建筑物，尤指适合一家一户居住的房屋。

建筑面积；建筑基底面积；建筑占地面积

bilingual.source: What about the building next to it?

bilingual.target: 这是一座美丽的石头建筑。
这是一座美丽的经典建筑。

bilingual.source: There was only one small building on a hill.

list.abstract: building，英语单词，名词，意为“建筑；建筑物”。

yingyinNormal.en: No way. I know everything about this building. Or used to. You know the sycamores on the other side of the building?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不可能吧，我对这幢建筑了如指掌，至少以前是，你知道这房子右边的梧桐吗？

yingyinNormal.en: It was a beautiful building and I was wandering around, looking at it, looking for the women's room, when a staff member informed me very firmly that the ladies' room was over there, and I should be sure not to go up stairs because women are never allowed in this building.
yingyinNormal.zh: 建筑很漂亮 我在里面游荡。欣赏它，找女卫生间。结果一位员工很肯定地告诉我，女卫生间在那里，我务必不要上楼去。因为女性不允许进入这座建筑。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: It's when you're out here, only an hour from the world's tallest building, that you'll truly appreciate just how miraculous Dubai is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当您身处沙漠，距离全球最高的建筑只有一小时路程，您会深深感受到迪拜的不可思议。

yingyinNormal.en: But this icy river isn't just for extreme sports. All the building materials for the festival at Harbin are taken from this spot to create the city of ice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除了极限运动外，这条冰河还有其它用处，哈尔滨冰雪节的所有建筑材料都从这里取用，冰城由此而来。

yingyinNormal.en: The first person I ever met who shares the name with a whole building. Or so I met when the first classmate I met was Sarah Wigglesworth, who bore no relation at all to the dorm, which would have been nice to know with that very intimidating moment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还碰到了第一个名字同整座建筑一样的人。这个人的名字叫作莎拉·威格尔斯沃思。她同那栋宿舍楼没有任何关系。当时我很震惊，知道没关系后我才舒了一口气。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: This is the first building I ever bought.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我买下的第一栋楼。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, there's no Johnson Senate building.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是没有约翰逊参议院大楼。

yingyinNormal.en: Evacuate the building and maybe you'll live.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从里面出来，没准你们还能活下来。

yingyinNormal.en: And that's the Chrysler Building right there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 克莱斯勒大楼就在那儿。

yingyinNormal.en: Now they are building their own space station.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而如今，他们正在建立他们自己的空间站。

yingyinNormal.en: She really has a building? With her name on it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她真有一栋大厦啊？还是以她的名字命名的。

yingyinNormal.en: What are these? Electrical plans for the building.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么？这栋楼的电路图。

yingyinNormal.en: In three minutes, this building will be demolished.
yingyinNormal.zh: 三分钟后，这座大楼就会坍塌。

yingyinNormal.en: Why not tell people? Why keep building those stations?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么不说出来？为什么还要建那些空间站？

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe she was planning on taking out the whole building.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她也许是想拿下整栋楼呢。

yingyinNormal.en: You changed the address on the building? What about mail?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你把门牌号给改了？信件怎么办？

yingyinNormal.en: It's Finn Polmar coming out of your wife's apartment building.
yingyinNormal.zh: 芬恩·波尔马，正从你妻子的公寓大楼走出来。

yingyinNormal.en: And everyone else; painting, clay or building-blocks? Building-Blocks. My goodness. Building-blocks are popular today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么其他人呢？画画，捏泥人，还是搭积木呢？搭积木！我的天啊。看来今天搭积木很受欢迎！

yingyinNormal.en: The 1200 building is Medley Industrial and Sanko Oil. The building across the street is Lee-Ray Shipping.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正前方的是曼尼工业和新科石油，对街是里瑞运输。

yingyinNormal.en: Today isn't just about building a duck village. It's about building your smile. Don't fight it. There it is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天我们不只是建造一个鸭子村而已，更是要让你学会微笑，别抗拒，终于笑了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 重建；改建；重新组装
n. 建筑物；营造物；建筑；发展；创造；筹办；建筑建筑物的过程；增强；增长

word_family.mean: v. 建筑；建造；加强；安装；固定；增大；委托（或提供资金；监管）建造；使成为组成部分；编；被编

examination_example.sentence: In 1866, the construction of the North Wing of the Treasury <highlight>Building</highlight> necessitated the demolition of the State Department <highlight>building</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1866年，财政部大楼北翼的建设需要拆除国务院大楼。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>building</highlight> has housed some of the nation's most significant diplomats and politicians.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这座建筑曾是美国一些最重要的外交官和政治家的住所。

examination_example.sentence: The Conservatives' planning reform explicitly gives rural development priority over conservation, even authorising "off-plan" <highlight>building</highlight> where local people might object.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 保守党的规划改革明确将农村发展置于保护之上，甚至授权在当地居民可能反对的地方进行“非规划”建筑。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 重建；改建；重新组装
n. 建筑工人；建设者；建造者；营造商；泥瓦匠；创建者；创立者；创建某物的人
n. 建筑物；营造物；建筑；发展；创造；筹办；建筑建筑物的过程；增强；增长
adj. 内置的；嵌在…内的；固有的；与生俱来的

word_family.mean: v. 建筑；建造；加强；安装；固定；增大；委托（或提供资金；监管）建造；使成为组成部分；编；被编

sense_info_list.en: a structure with a roof and walls, such as a house, school, store, or factory

examination_example.sentence: As a result, residents of five <highlight>buildings</highlight> around the northern side of the cathedral were being temporarily evacuated, he added.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他补充说，因此，大教堂北侧周围五栋建筑的居民被暂时疏散。

examination_example.sentence: But criticism over the original state of the <highlight>building</highlight> is likely to intensify over coming days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但对该建筑原始状态的批评可能会在未来几天加剧。

examination_example.sentence: The lack of adequate maintenance and daily attention to such a majestic <highlight>building</highlight> is the cause of this catastrophe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对如此宏伟的建筑缺乏足够的维护和日常关注是造成这场灾难的原因。

sense_info_list.en: the process or business of constructing something
the process of creating or developing something, typically a system or situation, over a period of time

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 泛指一切建筑物, 不限于居住的房子。
指长久或固定的住所或居住地。
指永久住家时, 带有家庭所特有的温暖、情感等气息。
中性词, 泛指一切供居住的建筑物, 尤指适合一家一户居住的房屋。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 重建；改建；重新组装
n. 建筑物；营造物；建筑；发展；创造；筹办；建筑建筑物的过程；增强；增长
adj. 内置的；嵌在…内的；固有的；与生俱来的

word_family.mean: v. 建筑；建造；加强；安装；固定；增大；委托（或提供资金；监管）建造；使成为组成部分；编；被编

sense_info_list.en: a structure with a roof and walls; such as a house; school; store; or factory

examination_example.sentence: He was surprised when his GPS system told him he had arrived, although there were no signs of any of the famous <highlight>buildings</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他有些惊讶，因为周围连一些著名建筑物的影子都见不着，他的GPS系统(全球定位系统)却提示他已到达目的地。

examination_example.sentence: Hired Joe to paint all the walls of its <highlight>buildings</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 聘请乔在屋里的所有墙壁上作画。

examination_example.sentence: We manufacture and export stone for <highlight>buildings</highlight> and other constructions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们生产和出口用于建筑的石材。

sense_info_list.en: the process or business of constructing something

examination_example.sentence: Governments have protected and promoted forests for diverse reasons, ranging from the need for wooden warships to a desire to promote suburban house-<highlight>building</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政府保护和建设森林的原因有很多，其中包括对木制军舰的需求和促进郊区房屋建设的愿望。

examination_example.sentence: Their stable supply of <highlight>building</highlight> materials.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们稳定的建筑材料供应。

sense_info_list.en: the process of creating or developing something; typically a system or situation; over a period of time

examination_example.sentence: If play and <highlight>building</highlight> are critical to 21st-century skill development, that's really good news.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果玩耍和培养对于发展21世纪的技能至关重要，那这就是好消息了。

examination_example.sentence: After spending years fretting over which skill-<highlight>building</highlight> programs to send their kids to after school, letting them simply play could seem like a step backward.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在为送孩子上哪种课后技能培训班烦恼多年后，让他们单纯去玩耍看起来就像是一种倒退。

examination_example.sentence: Take some time to check out the <highlight>buildings</highlight> where your classes will be held.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 花点时间去看看你在哪里上课。

examination_example.sentence: Hospital patients who see tree branches out their window are likely to recover at a faster rate than patients who see <highlight>buildings</highlight> instead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在医院里，看到窗外树枝的病人比看到建筑物的病人恢复得更快。

examination_example.sentence: Many <highlight>buildings</highlight> on the campus are his original creations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 校园里的许多建筑都是他的原创作品。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 重建；改建；重新组装
n. 建筑工人；建设者；建造者；营造商；泥瓦匠；创建者；创立者；创建某物的人
n. 建筑物；营造物；建筑；发展；创造；筹办；建筑建筑物的过程；增强；增长

word_family.mean: v. 建筑；建造；加强；安装；固定；增大；委托（或提供资金；监管）建造；使成为组成部分；编；被编

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 办公楼；办公建筑；办公大楼

examination_example.sentence: The creators say the big house will inspire the future of <highlight>building</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 创作者表示，这座大房子将激发建筑的未来。

examination_example.sentence: The Chinese created a 3D-printed <highlight>building</highlight> in just 48 hours in 2014.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2014年，中国人仅用48小时就创造了一座3D打印的建筑。

examination_example.sentence: They created a <highlight>building</highlight> the next year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 次年，他们建造了一座大楼。

examination_example.sentence: It is created to carry out the heavy <highlight>building</highlight> tasks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是为了执行繁重的建筑任务而创建的。

examination_example.sentence: Student from Yunnan, working with his parents on a <highlight>building</highlight> site when he got an admission letter(录取通知书) from Peking University.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一名来自云南的学生，当他收到北京大学的录取通知书时，正和父母在工地上工作。

examination_example.sentence: The villagers expect that the <highlight>building</highlight> of the bridge will be completed before the rainy season comes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 村民们期望这座桥能在雨季到来之前建成。
